articles.title: Everything We Know About ‘Avatar: The Last Airbender’ Season 2 On Netflix - Forbes
articles.description: This is everything we know about whether Avatar: The Last Airbender season 2 is happening on Netflix or not.
articles.content:
Avatar
Netflix
It is always risky to get attached to a new show on Netflix, as it always seems like a coinflip chance that its going to get cancelled right after you really start to get into it. So… [+2679 chars]
